System requirements:

Game information:  


Welcome to Kirata - Lost among the peaks of the Himalayas country with a rich tradition,
the world is threatened by a despotic ruler. Your hero, Ajay Gail came here to fulfill
the last wishes of his mother, but became embroiled in a civil war: the locals are trying
to overthrow the impostor Pagan Mina. Embark on a journey through the open world, but
beware: in an unfamiliar country with you anything can happen.


Game Features:  

Fauna Kirata diverse: It is home to leopards, rhinos, eagles and even oviphages rather
rare badgers - honey badger. Hunter, remember: going after prey, looking into both,
otherwise he will become a victim of ...

Celebrate enemy positions during the flight to improved giroplane, and if you noticed,
try to escape with the help of costume-wing. Hit the road riding a huge elephant, the
kind of which even experienced soldier zatryasutsya hamstring!

Choose the right weapon! No matter how difficult the task may seem, thanks to a large
arsenal of weapons you can get out of any situation.


RePack Features:  

Far Cry 4
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
